means: 批准，签认（合约等）( ratify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The treaty was declared invalid because it had not been ratified.
sentence.Network_cn: 条约没有得到批准，因此被宣布无效。

sentence.Network_en: The treaty was ratified by all the member states.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个条约得到了所有成员国的批准。

sentence.Network_en: The heads of the two government ratified the treaty.
sentence.Network_cn: 两国政府首脑签署了条约.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 至2002年12月,生物安全议定书计有103 签约国,但是经议会批准的(ratified)国家,仅有39个,未来似乎还有一段漫长的协商道路.议定书未 …
applicant is person , he shall submit ID card or copy of ratified ID card ;申请人为自然人的，应当提交身份证或者经公证的身份证复印件；
Inspection Quarantine Service has ratified this company to supply for ships ., 检验检疫机关允许此公司在宁波口岸从事外轮供应业务.
The company has ratified the export operation rights ., 公司具有国家批准的进出口经营权.

list.abs: the administration's problem always going to be the Senate , which decides whether to ratify international treaties , and doesn't much like doing so .这届政府的问题总是出在参议院，是否批准国际条约由那里决定，而在这方面它一向不怎么积极。
Each Member which ratifies this Convention shall ensure the effectiveapplication of its provis ions ., 批准本公约的每一会员国应确保有效地实施本公约的规定.
they ratify the pact because they think it will bring peace .他们批准了这项协定，因为他们认为它将能带来和平。
the details of the deal are being kept quiet until the local unions ratify , but it's expected to a done deal by late next week .的细节正在保持沉默，直到当地工会批准，但预计将是木已成舟了下周晚些时候。

entry.def: When national leaders or organizations ratify a treaty or written agreement, they make it official by giving their formal approval to it, usually by signing it or voting for it.

example.ex: The parliaments of Australia and Indonesia have yet to ratify the treaty.
example.tran: 澳大利亚和印度尼西亚的国会尚未批准该条约。

means.word_mean: 1. formally approved and invested with legal authority

auth_sentence.content: The United States has never ratified the Kyoto agreement.
auth_sentence.res_content: The United States has never ratified the Kyoto agreement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The United States has never ratified the Kyoto agreement.

auth_sentence.content: This treaty now looks unlikely to be fully ratified.
auth_sentence.res_content: This treaty now looks unlikely to be fully ratified.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This treaty now looks unlikely to be fully ratified.

auth_sentence.content: The United States has not ratified this convention.
auth_sentence.res_content: The United States has not ratified this convention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The United States has not ratified this convention.
